positions.description: Continued working on project LayerNext. Handled customer deployments, initialized new LayerNext setups for customers, and worked with Kerberos authentication mechanisms.
Worked on LayerNext, a strategic business intelligence platform. Primarily focused on backend development, infrastructure management, and automation (DevOps).
highlights: Developed ETL pipelines integrating MySQL, PostgreSQL, MSSQL, Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, Databricks
Implemented data crawling mechanisms for custom APIs
Worked on both AWS and Azure cloud environments
Implemented automation framework for deploying LayerNext
